To facilitate interpretation of anti-HDV prevalence estimates among patients diagnosed with cirrhosis or HCC, we calculated the PAF of HDV for cirrhosis and HCC among HBsAg-positive people. We used methodology recommended by the WHO, where PAF = prevalence among cases × [(odds ratio − 1)/odds ratio].
